short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modern restyling for the GR++ site for Technion students.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension fixes all the UI sins committed by the Faculty of Computer Science. Every student using cs.grades should download this. 

New(!): Selector in top left to go to any specific semester's courses.

I am actively maintaining this project for fun! Feel free to send me tips and suggestions for improvement by email or WhatsApp :)
